definition: thorough and detailed/exhaustive/the tedious details in full
to use up/to exhaust/to end/to finish/to the utmost/exhausted/finished/to the limit (of sth)/all/entirely

sentences.english: In more special, fluidic thrust-vectoring concept is described in more detail.
sentences.chinese: 同時對射流推力矢量技術作了更詳盡的描述。

sentences.english: Technology is the outcome of a comprehensive two-year study of the ins and outs of the human bare foot.
sentences.chinese: 技術是我們兩年來對人體足部結構詳盡研究的成果。

sentences.english: At the end of the paper, we expatiate the kernel part of the hardware.
sentences.chinese: 最後，對硬件實現的核心部分作了詳盡的闡述。

sentences.english: In a low-context culture , the words used by the speaker explicitly convey the speaker's message to the listener.
sentences.chinese: 在低語境文化中，講話者詳盡地向聽衆傳達信息。

sentences.english: The above list is hardly exhaustive.
sentences.chinese: 上面的列表並不夠詳盡。

sentences.english: There is an exhaustive list of sample programs provided in the samples folders.
sentences.chinese: 示例文件夾中提供了一個詳盡的示例程序列表。

sentences.english: These ideas are dealt with more fully in Chapter Four.
sentences.chinese: 在第四章會更詳盡地闡述這些觀點。

sentences.english: Columbus kept a careful and detailed chronicle of his voyages.
sentences.chinese: 哥倫布按序仔而詳盡次航程。

sentences.english: It provides the most detailed data on cohabitation of men and women to date.
sentences.chinese: 這份資料提供了男女未婚同居的最詳盡的數據。

sentences.english: Provide detailed product information, and the latest industry news.
sentences.chinese: 提供詳盡的產品信息，和最新的行業動態。

sentences.english: She explained all the hows and whys of the issue.
sentences.chinese: 她詳盡說明了問題的情況及原由。

sentences.english: Objective To provide the exact dimensions of the intertubercular sulcus of the humerus.
sentences.chinese: 目的提供詳盡的肱骨結節間溝形態資料。

sentences.english: The book was a detailed report of the crime.
sentences.chinese: 這整本書是有關於那個犯罪活動的詳盡報導。

sentences.english: The expert elaborates his theory from his own reason.
sentences.chinese: 這位專家詳盡闡述他的學說。

sentences.english: Daston more detailed study of the history of the evolution of the concept of objectivity.
sentences.chinese: 達斯頓比較詳盡地考察了客觀性概念的演變史。

definition: to explain/to illustrate/to indicate/to show/to prove/explanation/directions/caption/CL:個|个[ge4]
to relate (a story or information)/to tell or talk about/to recount/narration/telling/narrative/account
to expound (a position)/to elaborate (on a topic)/to treat (a subject)
